app_descript:
App Name: The Chosen

Brief: Experience the life of Jesus Christ in a way like never before with "The Chosen", the first-ever multi-season TV series about Jesus. This app brings you the acclaimed series directly to your mobile device, allowing you to watch the story unfold through the eyes of those who encountered Him. Dive into the Christmas special, catch up with the latest episodes, and even contribute to the making of future seasons with just a few taps.
